reqs:
Pre-reqs: GEOB 270. (Or third-year standing in ENSC or GEOB specializations.)
Note: This is a wait list for GEOB 373, section 201, Term 2. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
description: Aerial photography; measurement from aerial photographs; photo-interpretation in geographic analysis; remote sensing of the earth's surface and atmosphere.
